abstract.p: Differential analysis of MS-data to identify biomarkers or to understand biology is a cornerstone in proteomics. DEqMS is a robust method for analysis of both labelled and label-free MS-data. The method takes into account the inherent dependence of protein variance on the number of PSMs or peptides used for quantification, thereby providing a more accurate variance estimation. Compared to current methods, DEqMS achieves better accuracy and statistical power in quantitative proteomics. The tool is available as user-friendly R package.
